title: Item Sets and Runes- Cannot Add Runes or Create New Sets/Add items
body:
I just leveled up to 15 (yay!) and tried to insert a new rune into the available slot, and not only would the rune not go in into the new slot, but the available slot would not highlight as it once did. Additionally, I tried to make a new item set for Olaf after purchasing him, but when I try to drag the desired item from the list to the new block nothing happens; I tried with other previous made lists to add items, nothing worked.

Am I doing something wrong? Please help, this is really annoying and I want to go rage mode with Olaf :)
Thank you for your time, help, and consideration.

-Arc

replies.body: Are you using a Mac running macOS Sierra? If not, are you running any background programs such as Curse voice or Discord?
I am using a mac with Sierra, and no I don't have any programs like that running in the background.

Thanks for confirming that. So Item sets are part of a known bug with macOS Sierra. The current workaround is to create/edit your item sets on another computer not running Sierra. The item set changes will be visible on your Mac, since item sets are stored server-side. Runes can be added by double-clicking on the Rune, but the issue with dragging them is related to the same issue with Item Sets at the moment. 

We're currently tracking the bugs for macOS 10.12 Sierra on [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra). Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thank you for letting me know there are issues with Sierra. I currently do not have another computer to change my item sets, is there another option by chance? A work around, perhaps?

Unfortunately, there's no other workaround at the moment. You may want to reach out to a friend that doesn't play on a Mac and see if you can commandeer their rig for a few minutes to update your Item Sets.

If you have any other questions, hit me up.

Hello,
Is your game installed in a non-classic folder? usb?
Delete them all and restart from scratch. Also, don't use special characters in your rune page/item sets names, have each one a really different name.
Lastly, try and repair the client, it never hurts:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
This did not work. My Item sets/rune pages do not have special characters and the troubleshooting did not work either. It's still doing the same thing.
